description:
Let's make crepes on the Nintendo Switch™!
Cook with finesse, place the right toppings, and make as many crepes as you can!
Share Joy-Con™ and play with up to 4 players!
Reach for the ultimate high score!

《Rules》
Cook the batter and choose toppings to match the order!
Work quickly and accurately for maximum points, and don't let your batter burn!
Keep making crepes until time runs out!

《How to Play》
1. Pour the batter and spread it out!

2. When the batter cooks, start adding the toppings listed in the order!

3. Add whipped cream or choco cream!

4. Add strawberries, kiwi, banana, or mango!

5. Add strawberry, kiwi, chocolate, or mango sauce!

6. When your crepe is finished cooking, wrap it up! Your crepe is complete!

【Score Attack】
Make as many crepes as you can, and aim for a high spot on the leaderboards!

【Battle】
Compete with others and test your crepe-making skills!
name: Make it! Crepe
